translations: 刈草；牧草地；一次所割之草
刈……；收割（mow 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: My long scythe whispered and left the hay to make "It returns us to the work of mowing."
sentences.translation: 我的长长的镰刀留下了一堆稻草并低语着：“这让我们重新回到割草的劳动中。

sentences.sentence: He says in that next to last line, "It is the sweetest dream of labor, and it is the earnest love that is doing this mowing."
sentences.translation: 他在倒数第二行说：“这是劳动者最甜美的梦，而且这是在割草时最真挚的爱。”
